channel.title: Sports on Eric Davis
channel.description: Recent content in Sports on Eric Davis

item.title: Good luck, UNLV
item.description: When you’re a UNLV basketball fan, you’re used to knots in your stomach. No lead feels safe until the final buzzer rings. Opposing players put up career days with alarming regularity. Bottom feeder teams come out swinging against the former World Champs and steal one on your home floor. But those knots usually subside once the season wraps up. When Mick Cronin flew back to Cincinnati without being announced as the new head coach, I knew the knots would be here to stay during the offseason, too.
